Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateColumnLa.name: collectionView(_:layout:heightForItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateColumnLa.abstract: The height for the item at the given indexPath (Priority 2)

Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateColumnLa.name: collectionView(_:layout:aspectRatioForItemAt:)
Protocols/CollectionViewDelegateColumnLa.abstract: The aspect ration for the item at the given indexPath (Priority 1). Width and height must be greater than 0.

Extensions/IndexPath.html#/s:ZFE14Collec.name: for(item:section:)
Extensions/IndexPath.html#/s:ZFE14Collec.abstract: Create an index path with a given item and section

Extensions/IndexPath.html#/s:vE14Collect.name: _item
Extensions/IndexPath.html#/s:vE14Collect.abstract: Returns the item of the index path

Extensions/IndexPath.html#/s:vE14Collect.name: _section
Extensions/IndexPath.html#/s:vE14Collect.abstract: Returns the section of the index path

Extensions/Array.html#/s:FE14CollectionV.name: object(at:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:FE14CollectionV.abstract: Returns the obejct at the given index, first validating the index

Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.name: interitemSpacing
Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.abstract: The vertical spacing between items in the same column

Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.name: itemHeight
Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.abstract: The default height to apply to all items

Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.name: insetSupplementaryViews
Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.abstract: If supplementary views should respect section insets or fill the CollectionView width

Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.name: itemRenderDirection
Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.abstract: A hint as to how to render items when deciding which column to place them in

Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.name: itemWidth
Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html#.abstract: the calculated width of items based on the total width and number of columns (read only)

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.name: scrollDirection
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.abstract: The direction that the collection view should scroll

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.name: collectionViewContentSize
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.abstract: The size that encapsulates all views within the collection view

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.name: pinHeadersToTop
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.abstract: If supporting views should be pinned to the top of the view

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: invalidate()
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Currently this is only called when the layout is applied to a collection view.

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: shouldInvalidateLayout(forBoundsChange:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Asks the layout if it should be invalidated due to a bounds change on the collection view

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: prepare()
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Tells the layout object to update the current layout.

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.name: allIndexPaths
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:vC1.abstract: All the index paths to be displayed by the collection view

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: layoutAttributesForElements(in:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Returns the layout attributes for all views in a given rect

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: layoutAttributesForItem(at:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Returns the layout attributes for an item at the given index path

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: layoutAttributesForSupplementaryView(ofKind:atIndexPath:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Returns the layout attributes for the supplementary view of the given kind and the given index path

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: rectForSection(_:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Returns the frame that encapsulates all the content in the section

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: contentRectForSection(_:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Returns the rect that encapsulates just the items of a section

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: scrollRectForItem(at:atPosition:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Provides he layout a chance to adjust the frame to which the collection view should scroll to show an item

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.name: indexPathForNextItem(moving:from:)
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html#/s:FC1.abstract: Returns the index path for the next item in a given direction

Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html#/s.name: interitemSpacing
Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html#/s.abstract: The vertical spacing between items in the same column

Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html#/s.name: itemHeight
Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html#/s.abstract: The vertical spacing between items in the same column

Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html#/s.name: insetSupplementaryViews
Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html#/s.abstract: If supplementary views should respect section insets or fill the CollectionView width

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: delegate
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate to the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: dataSource
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The object that provides data for the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: contentDocumentView
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The content view in which all cells and views are displayed

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: register(class:forCellWithReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Register a class to be initialized when loading reusable cells

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: register(nib:forCellWithReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Register a nib to be loaded as reusable cells

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: register(class:forSupplementaryViewOfKind:withReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Register a class to be initialized when loading reusable supplementary views

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: register(nib:forSupplementaryViewOfKind:withReuseIdentifier:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Register a nib to be loaded as a supplementary view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: dequeueReusableCell(withReuseIdentifier:for:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Retrieve a cell for a given reuse identifier and index path.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: dequeueReusableSupplementaryView(ofKind:withReuseIdentifier:for:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns a reusable supplementary view located by its identifier and kind.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: floatingContentView
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: A view atop the collection view used to display non-scrolling accessory views

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: addAccessoryView(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Adds the given view to the floating content view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: numberOfSections
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns the number of sections displayed by the collection view.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: numberOfItems(in:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the number of items in the specified section.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: reloadData()
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Reloads all the data and views in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: collectionViewLayout
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The layout used to organize the collected view’s items.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: contentVisibleRect
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The visible rect of the document view that is visible

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: contentSize
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The total size of all items/views

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: contentOffset
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The offset of the content view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: prepareAll
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Force layout of all items, not just those in the visible content area

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: frameForSection(at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the frame for the specified section

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: reloadDataOnBoundsChange
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Reload the data (section & item counts) when the collectionView bounds change. Defaults to false.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: reloadLayout(_:scrollPosition:completion:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Reload the collection view layout and apply the updated frames to the cells/views.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: isScrolling
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns true if the collection view is currently scrolling

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: scrollVelocity
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns the current velocity of a scroll in points/second

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: peakScrollVelocity
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns the peak valocity of a scroll during the last scrolling session

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: indexPathForFirstVisibleItem
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns the lowest index path of all visible items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: animationDuration
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The duration of animations when performing animated layout changes

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: performBatchUpdates(_:completion:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Perform multiple updates to be applied together

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: insertSections(_:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Insert sections at the given indexes

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: deleteSections(_:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Remove sections and their items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: moveSection(_:to:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Move a section and its items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: insertItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Insert items at specific index paths

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: deleteItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Deletes the items at the specified index paths.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: reloadItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Reload the items and the given index paths.

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: moveItem(at:to:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Moves the item from it’s current index path to another

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: trackSectionHover
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: If true, the delegate’s collectionView(_:,mouseMovedToSection:) will be notified when the cursor is within a section frame

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: allowsSelection
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: If the collection view should allow selection of its items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: selectionMode
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Determines what happens when an item is clicked

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: allowsMultipleSelection
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: allows the selection of multiple items via modifier keys (command & shift)

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: allowsEmptySelection
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: If true, clicking empty space will deselect all items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: indexPathForHighlightedItem
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The index path of the highlighted item, if any

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: highlightItem(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Manually set the highlighted item reguardless of the cursor location

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: indexPathsForSelectedItems
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns the index paths for all selected items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: sortedIndexPathsForSelectedItems
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns the index paths for all selected items ordered from first to last

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: itemAtIndexPathIsSelected(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns if the item at a given index path is selected

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: selectAllItems(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Selects all items in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: selectItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Select the items at the given index paths

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: selectItem(at:animated:scrollPosition:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Select items

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: deselectItems(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Deselect cells at given index paths

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: deselectAllItems(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Deselect all items in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: deselectItem(at:animated:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Deselect the item at a given index path

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: visibleCells
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns all visible cells in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: indexPathsForVisibleItems
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: Returns the index paths for all visible cells in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: itemAtIndexPathIsVisible(_:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns true if the item at the index path is visible

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: cellForItem(at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the cell at a given index path if it is visible

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: indexPath(for:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the index path for a cell in the collection view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: indexPathForItem(at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns a index path for the item at a given point

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: firstIndexPathForItem(near:radius:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the first index path within a given distance of a point

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: firstIndexPathForItem(in:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the first index path found intersecting a given rect

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: indexPathsForItems(in:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns all items intersecting a given rect

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: indexPathForSection(at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the indexPath for the section that contains the given point

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: indexPath(forSupplementaryView:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the index path for a supplementary view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: supplementaryView(forElementKind:at:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Returns the visible supplementary view of the given kind at indexPath

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: scrollItem(at:to:animated:completion:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Scroll an item into view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.name: scrollRect(_:to:animated:completion:)
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:FC14Colle.abstract: Scroll an given rect into view

Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.name: indexPathsForDraggingItems
Classes/CollectionView.html#/s:vC14Colle.abstract: The index paths for items included in the currect dragging session

Classes/CollectionView.html.name: CollectionView
Classes/CollectionView.html.abstract: A highliy customizable collection view with cell reuse, animated updates, and custom layouts

Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html.name: CollectionViewListLayout
Classes/CollectionViewListLayout.html.abstract: A feature packed collection view layout with pinterest like layouts, aspect ratio sizing, and drag and drop.

Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html.name: CollectionViewLayout
Classes/CollectionViewLayout.html.abstract: The CollectionViewLayout class is an abstract base class that you subclass and use to generate layout information for a collection view. The job of a layout object is to determine the placement of cells, supplementary views inside the collection view’s bounds and to report that information to the collection view when asked. The collection view then applies the provided layout information to the corresponding views so that they can be presented onscreen.

Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html.name: CollectionViewColumnLayout
Classes/CollectionViewColumnLayout.html.abstract: A feature packed collection view layout with pinterest like layouts, aspect ratio sizing, and drag and drop.
